title: r/Prorevenge My Boss Stole from Me, So I Ruined His Business & Marriage!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP works at Subway for an incredibly toxic, penny-pinching boss who breaks the law to save a few bucks. Unsurprisingly, the manager also tries to screw over OP by paying him less. OP isn't having any of that, so gets some prorevenge by reporting his boss's crimes to the local authorities. Say goodbye to your business, boss!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
